To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private StickSandwich _sticksandwich;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_sticksandwich = StickSandwich(symbol);

// In OnData()
if (_sticksandwich.IsReady)
{
    var current = _sticksandwich.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.sticksandwich = self.StickSandwich(symbol)

# In OnData()
if self.sticksandwich.IsReady:
    current = self.sticksandwich.Current.Value
